com.nokia.maps.component.gesture

Interface ExtendedEventListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TouchEventHandler

    public interface ExtendedEventListener
extends EventListener
    This interface defines a series of events for handling Gesture Events from the Gesture API.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean flick(int x, int y, float direction, int speed, int speedX, int speedY)
      This method is called from the GestureMapCanvas when a Flick has occurred.
      boolean longPress(int x, int y)
      This method is called from the GestureMapCanvas when a Long Press event has occurred.
      boolean pinch(int x, int y, int centerX, int centerY, int centerChangeX, int centerChangeY, int distanceStarting, int distanceCurrent, int distanceChange)
      This method is called from the GestureMapCanvas when a Pinch event has occurred.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.nokia.maps.map.EventListener

        keyPressed, keyReleased, keyRepeated, pointerDragged, pointerPressed, pointerReleased

    • Method Detail

      • longPress

        boolean longPress(int x,
                int y)
        This method is called from the GestureMapCanvas when a Long Press event has occurred.

        Note the MapComponent must be placed on a GestureMapCanvas and the device must support the Gesture API to respond to the longPress() event.

        Parameters:
        x - x axis pixel coordinate on the screen that has been long pressed.
        y - y axis pixel coordinate on the screen that has been long pressed.
        Returns:
        true if the event should be consumed or false if it should be passed to subsequent event handlers.

      • flick

        boolean flick(int x,
            int y,
            float direction,
            int speed,
            int speedX,
            int speedY)
        This method is called from the GestureMapCanvas when a Flick has occurred.

        Note the MapComponent must be placed on a GestureMapCanvas and the device must support the Gesture API to respond to the longPress() event.

        Parameters:
        x - x axis pixel coordinate on the screen where the flick event occurred.
        y - y axis pixel coordinate on the screen where the flick event occurred.
        direction - direction of the flick event.
        speed - speed of the flick.
        speedX - speed of the flick on the x axis.
        speedY - speed of the flick on the y axis.
        Returns:
        true if the event should be consumed or false if it should be passed to subsequent event handlers.

      • pinch

        boolean pinch(int x,
            int y,
            int centerX,
            int centerY,
            int centerChangeX,
            int centerChangeY,
            int distanceStarting,
            int distanceCurrent,
            int distanceChange)
        This method is called from the GestureMapCanvas when a Pinch event has occurred.

        Note the MapComponent must be placed on a GestureMapCanvas and the device must support the Gesture API to respond to the pinch() event.

        Parameters:
        x - x axis pixel coordinate on the screen where the pinch started.
        y - y axis pixel coordinate on the screen where the pinch started.
        centerX - x axis pixel coordinate describing the current centre of the pinch
        centerY - y axis pixel coordinate describing the current centre of the pinch.
        centerChangeX - difference in x axis pixel coordinate from initial to current location
        centerChangeY - difference in y axis pixel coordinate from intiial to current location
        distanceStarting - initial number of pixels between the pinch points
        distanceCurrent - current number of pixels between the pinch points
        distanceChange - difference in size between the original can current pinch sizes.
        Returns:
        true if the event should be consumed or false if it should be passed to subsequent event handlers.
